movies.title: Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods
movies.plot: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.
movies.simplePlot: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.

biography.bio: Roger Carel was born on August 14, 1927 in Paris, France as Roger Bancharel. He is known for his work on The Twelve Tasks of Asterix (1976), Asterix and Cleopatra (1968) and Asterix the Gaul (1967).
biography.name: Roger Carel

biography.bio: Lorànt Deutsch was born on October 27, 1975 in Sablé-sur-Sarthe, Sarthe, France as László Matekovics. He is an actor and writer, known for Astérix et les Vikings (2006), Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014) and Bienvenue chez les Rozes (2003). He has been married to Marie-Julie Baup since October 3, 2009. They have two children.
biography.name: Lorànt Deutsch

biography.bio: Laurent Lafitte was born on August 22, 1973 in Paris, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Elle (2016), The Crimson Rivers (2000) and Les petits mouchoirs (2010).
biography.name: Laurent Lafitte

biography.bio: Alexandre Astier was born on June 16, 1974 in Lyon, France. He is a writer and actor, known for Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014), Kaamelott (2004) and Dies irae (2003). He is married to Anne-Gaëlle Daval. They have five children.
biography.name: Alexandre Astier

biography.bio: Alain Chabat was born on November 24, 1958 in Oran, France. He is an actor and producer, known for Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra (2002), Ice Age: Continental Drift (2012) and The Science of Sleep (2006).
biography.name: Alain Chabat

biography.bio: Elie Semoun was born on October 16, 1963 in Antony, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au Bon Dieu? (2014), Astérix aux jeux olympiques (2008) and Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014).
biography.name: Elie Semoun

biography.bio: Géraldine Nakache was born on February 16, 1980 in Puteaux, Hauts-de-Seine, France. She is an actress and director, known for Tout ce qui brille (2010), Les infidèles (2012) and Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014). She was previously married to Manu Payet.
biography.name: Géraldine Nakache

biography.bio: Artus de Penguern was born on March 13, 1957 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France. He was an actor and writer, known for Amélie (2001), Grégoire Moulin contre l'humanité (2001) and Frantic (1988). He was married to Pascale Arbillot. He died on May 14, 2013 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Artus de Penguern

biography.bio: Lionnel Astier is an actor and writer, known for Kaamelott (2004), Hero Corp (2008) and Les Lyonnais (2011). He is married to Drevon, José. They have one child. He was previously married to Joëlle Sevilla.
biography.name: Lionnel Astier

biography.bio: François Morel was born on June 10, 1959 in Flers, Orne, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Le chat du rabbin (2011), Trilogy: Two (2002) and Happiness Is in the Field (1995).
biography.name: François Morel

biography.bio: Guillaume Briat is an actor, known for Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014), Les aventures extraordinaires d'Adèle Blanc-Sec (2010) and Dans le décor (2009).
biography.name: Guillaume Briat

biography.bio: Florence Foresti was born on November 8, 1973 in Vénissieux, Rhône, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Florence Foresti: Mother Fucker (2010), Foresti Party (2012) and Florence Foresti fait des sketches à la Cigale (2005).
biography.name: Florence Foresti

biography.bio: Serge Papagalli is an actor and director, known for Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014), Mais y va où le monde? (2011) and Kaamelott (2004).
biography.name: Serge Papagalli

biography.bio: Born in 1948 to French actress Annick Alane, this good-looking, eclectic thespian has never shown any disdain for any form of his art: theater (in which he served, among many others, Tchekhov, Shakespeare and Molière); musical comedy - both in England and in France ("Can Can", "South Pacific", "Peter Pan", "My Fair Lady"): television (which gave him the opportunity to embody historical figures such as Camille Desmoulins and Paul Ramadier); dubbing (Bernard Alane lent his voice to many a cartoon); and, of course cinema. His debut on the big screen exemplify his protean talent: comical in "Hibernatus", his first film (1969), he displays virile charm in his second movie "Mon oncle Benjamin". Unfortunately for film lovers, his appearances on the big screen have been irregular and generally too brief, for instance in his last feature to-date, "Agathe Cléry" (2008), where he only has a bit-part as one of Jean Rochefort's two sons.
biography.name: Bernard Alane

biography.bio: Laurent Morteau is an actor, known for Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods (2014), The Jungle Bunch: The Movie (2011) and My Mummy is in America and She Met Buffalo Bill (2013).
biography.name: Laurent Morteau

categories.category: Best Original Score for an Animated Feature Film
